metadata.author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Sets the time name for analysis

{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"**NOTE**: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function **OCILogs** to work as expected. [Follow steps to get this Kusto Function](https://aka.ms/sentinel-oci-parser)"},"name":"text - 8"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"cd8447d9-b096-4673-92d8-2a1e8291a125","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange","type":4,"description":"Sets the time name for analysis","value":{"durationMs":7776000000},"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":2592000000},{"durationMs":7776000000}]},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 11"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"OCILogs
| make-series TotalEvents = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain};","size":0,"title":"Events Over Time","color":"magenta","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart","graphSettings":{"type":0}},"customWidth":"60","name":"query - 12","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"55"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let users = OCILogs
| where isnotempty(data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s)
| summarize i = dcount(data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s)
| extend t = 'Total users';
let inst = OCILogs
| where isnotempty(data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s)
| summarize i = dcount(data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s)
| extend t = 'Total instances';
let ip = OCILogs
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| summarize i = dcount(DstIpAddr)
| extend t = 'Total IP addresses';
union isfuzzy=true users, inst, ip

properties.description: @{workbookKey=OCIWorkbook; logoFileName=Azure_Sentinel.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Oracle Cloud Infrastructure; templateRelativePath=OracleCloudInfrastructureOCI.json; subtitle=; provider=Microsoft}.description
OCIDestinationsIn_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'ACCEPT'
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == False
| summarize count() by DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for destination ports of inbound traffic.

properties.description: OCIDestinationsOut_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'ACCEPT'
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr) == False
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr, DstPortNumber
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for destination ports of outbound traffic.

properties.description: OCILaunchedInstances_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType endswith 'LaunchInstance'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for new launched instances.

properties.description: OCIUpdateActivities_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s startswith 'Update'
| project TimeGenerated, data_eventName_s, data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for update activities performed by users.

properties.description: OCIUserDeleteActions_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s startswith 'Delete'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for delete operations performed by user.

properties.description: OCIUserDeletedUsers_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'DeleteUser'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for users being deleted.

properties.description: OCIUserNewUsers_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'CreateUser'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for new users created.

properties.description: OCIUserSources_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s startswith 'InteractiveLogin'
| summarize makeset(SrcIpAddr) by data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for user source IP addresses.

properties.description: OCIUserTerminatedInstances_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'TerminateInstance'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

properties.description: OCIUserUpdatedInstances_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'UpdateInstance'
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

properties.displayName: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (via Codeless Connector Framework)

connectorUiConfig.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (via Codeless Connector Framework)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) data connector provides the capability to ingest OCI Logs from [OCI Stream](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Streaming/Concepts/streamingoverview.htm) into Microsoft Sentinel using the [OCI Streaming REST API](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/api/#/streaming/streaming/20180418).

dataTypes.name: OCI_LogsV2_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
OCI_LogsV2_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)
| summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
| where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: OCI Streaming API access
customs.description: Access to the OCI Streaming API through a API Signing Keys is required.

instructionSteps.title: Connect to OCI Streaming API to start collecting Event logs in Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description:
1) Log in to the OCI console and access the navigation menu.
2) In the navigation menu, go to "Analytics & AI" -> "Streaming".
3) Click "Create Stream".
4) Select an existing "Stream Pool" or create a new one.
5) Enter the following details:
   - "Stream Name"
   - "Retention"
   - "Number of Partitions"
   - "Total Write Rate"
   - "Total Read Rate" (based on your data volume)
6) In the navigation menu, go to "Logging" -> "Service Connectors".
7) Click "Create Service Connector".
8) Enter the following details:
   - "Connector Name"
   - "Description"
   - "Resource Compartment"
9) Select the "Source": "Logging".
10) Select the "Target": "Streaming".
11) (Optional) Configure "Log Group", "Filters", or use a "custom search query" to stream only the required logs.
12) Configure the "Target" by selecting the previously created stream.
13) Click "Create".
14) Follow the documentation to create a [Private Key and API Key Configuration File](https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/API/Concepts/apisigningkey.htm).

parameters.label: Add stream
parameters.title: Add Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Stream
parameters.subtitle: Connect to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data

parameters.label: Stream OCID
parameters.placeholder: Provide the OCI Stream OCID (E.g. ocid1.stream.oc1..xxxxxxEXAMPLExxxxxx)
parameters.name: streamId

parameters.label: Public Message Endpoint of the stream (Service Endpoint Base URL)
parameters.placeholder: Provide the Service Endpoint Base URL: (https://cell-1.streaming.ap-hyderabad-1.oci.oraclecloud.com)
parameters.name: serviceEndpointBaseUrl

parameters.text: The partition ID uses zero-based indexing. For example, if a stream has 3 partitions, the valid partition IDs are 0, 1, or 2.

parameters.label: Partition Id
parameters.placeholder: Provide the Partition Id. (E.g. 0 or 1 or 2)
parameters.name: partitions

parameters.label: Fingerprint
parameters.placeholder: Provide the fingerprint for the Pem File Content. (E.g. 12:34:56:78:90:AB:CD:EF:GH:IJ:KL:MN:OP)
parameters.name: publicFingerprint

parameters.text: If your PEM file is not encrypted, leave Pass Phrase as blank.

parameters.label: Pem File Pass Phrase
parameters.placeholder: Just Leave blank If not encrypted)
parameters.name: passPhrase

connectorUiConfig.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (via Codeless Connector Framework)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) data connector provides the capability to ingest OCI Logs from [OCI Stream](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Streaming/Concepts/streamingoverview.htm) into Microsoft Sentinel using the [OCI Streaming REST API](https://docs.oracle.com/iaas/api/#/streaming/streaming/20180418).

dataTypes.name: OCI_LogsV2_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
OCI_LogsV2_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)
| summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
| where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: OCI Streaming API access
customs.description: Access to the OCI Streaming API through a API Signing Keys is required.

instructionSteps.title: Connect to OCI Streaming API to start collecting Event logs in Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description:
1) Log in to the OCI console and access the navigation menu.
2) In the navigation menu, go to "Analytics & AI" -> "Streaming".
3) Click "Create Stream".
4) Select an existing "Stream Pool" or create a new one.
5) Enter the following details:
   - "Stream Name"
   - "Retention"
   - "Number of Partitions"
   - "Total Write Rate"
   - "Total Read Rate" (based on your data volume)
6) In the navigation menu, go to "Logging" -> "Service Connectors".
7) Click "Create Service Connector".
8) Enter the following details:
   - "Connector Name"
   - "Description"
   - "Resource Compartment"
9) Select the "Source": "Logging".
10) Select the "Target": "Streaming".
11) (Optional) Configure "Log Group", "Filters", or use a "custom search query" to stream only the required logs.
12) Configure the "Target" by selecting the previously created stream.
13) Click "Create".
14) Follow the documentation to create a [Private Key and API Key Configuration File](https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/API/Concepts/apisigningkey.htm).

parameters.label: Add stream
parameters.title: Add Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Stream
parameters.subtitle: Connect to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data

parameters.label: Stream OCID
parameters.placeholder: Provide the OCI Stream OCID (E.g. ocid1.stream.oc1..xxxxxxEXAMPLExxxxxx)
parameters.name: streamId

parameters.label: Public Message Endpoint of the stream (Service Endpoint Base URL)
parameters.placeholder: Provide the Service Endpoint Base URL: (https://cell-1.streaming.ap-hyderabad-1.oci.oraclecloud.com)
parameters.name: serviceEndpointBaseUrl

parameters.text: The partition ID uses zero-based indexing. For example, if a stream has 3 partitions, the valid partition IDs are 0, 1, or 2.

parameters.label: Partition Id
parameters.placeholder: Provide the Partition Id. (E.g. 0 or 1 or 2)
parameters.name: partitions

parameters.label: Fingerprint
parameters.placeholder: Provide the fingerprint for the Pem File Content. (E.g. 12:34:56:78:90:AB:CD:EF:GH:IJ:KL:MN:OP)
parameters.name: publicFingerprint

parameters.text: If your PEM file is not encrypted, leave Pass Phrase as blank.

parameters.label: Pem File Pass Phrase
parameters.placeholder: Just Leave blank If not encrypted)
parameters.name: passPhrase

properties.displayName: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (via Codeless Connector Framework)

connectorDefinitionName.defaultValue: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (via Codeless Connector Framework)

properties.description: OCIDiscoveryActivity_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
let threshold = 20;
OCILogs
| where data_eventName_s startswith 'List' or data_eventName_s startswith 'Get'
| summarize count() by data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = data_definedTags_Oracle_Tags_CreatedBy_s

properties.description: OCIEventRuleDeleted_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6
Detects when event rule was deleted.
properties.query:
OCILogs
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'DeleteRule'
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: OCIInboundSSHConnection_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'ACCEPT'
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == False
| where DstPortNumber == 22
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

OCILogs
| where data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s contains '/opc/v1' or data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s contains '/openstack'
| where HttpStatusCode == 200
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

OCILogs
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'ACCEPT'
| where DstIpAddr == '169.254.169.254'
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects when multiple instances were launched.
properties.query:
let threshold = 5;
OCILogs
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'LaunchInstance'
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where count_ >= threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects when multiple instances were terminated.
properties.query:
let threshold = 5;
OCILogs
| where data_eventName_s =~ 'TerminateInstance'
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where count_ >= threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: OCIMultipleRejects_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6
Detects multiple rejects on rare ports.
properties.displayName: OCI - Multiple rejects on rare ports
properties.query:
let threshold = 50;
let r_dports = 
OCILogs
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == False
| summarize count() by DstPortNumber
| top 10 by count_ asc
| summarize dports = makeset(DstPortNumber)
| extend k = 1;
OCILogs
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'REJECT'
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == False
| extend k = 1
| join kind=innerunique (r_dports) on k
| where dports has tostring(DstPortNumber)
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.displayName: OCI - Multiple rejects on rare ports

properties.description: OCISSHScan_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
let threshold = 5;
OCILogs
| where EventType contains 'vcn.flowlogs'
| where data_action_s =~ 'REJECT'
| where ipv4_is_private(DstIpAddr)
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == False
| where DstPortNumber == 22
| summarize p_count = dcount(DstIpAddr) by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where p_count > threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: OCIUnexpectedUserAgent_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCILogs
| where isnotempty(HttpUserAgentOriginal)
| where strlen(HttpUserAgentOriginal) <= 10
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: OCILogs Data Parser with template version 3.0.6

properties.query:
OCI_Logs_CL
| extend EventVendor = 'Oracle'
| extend EventProduct = 'Oracle Cloud Infrastructure'
| extend EventStartTime = coalesce(unixtime_seconds_todatetime(column_ifexists("data_startTime_d", long(null))), time_t)
| extend EventEndTime = coalesce(unixtime_seconds_todatetime(column_ifexists("data_endTime_d", long(null))), time_t)
| extend SrcIpAddr=coalesce(column_ifexists("data_sourceAddress_s",''),data_identity_ipAddress_s)
, SrcPortNumber=column_ifexists("data_sourcePort_d", '')
, DstIpAddr=column_ifexists("data_destinationAddress_s",'')
, DstPortNumber=column_ifexists("data_destinationPort_d",'')
, DstBytes=column_ifexists("data_bytesOut_d",'')
, NetworkProtocol=column_ifexists("data_protocolName_s",'')
, data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s = column_ifexists("data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s",'')
, data_stateChange_current_userName_s = column_ifexists("data_stateChange_current_userName_s",'')
, data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s = column_ifexists("data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s", '')
, data_action_s = column_ifexists("data_action_s",'')
| project-rename EventType=type_s
| project-rename EventMessage=data_message_s
| project-rename HttpUserAgentOriginal=data_identity_userAgent_s
| project-rename HttpStatusCode=data_response_status_s
| project-rename HttpRequestMethod=data_request_action_s
| union isfuzzy=true OCI_LogsV2_CL

OCI_Logs_CL
| extend EventVendor = 'Oracle'
| extend EventProduct = 'Oracle Cloud Infrastructure'
| extend EventStartTime = coalesce(unixtime_seconds_todatetime(column_ifexists("data_startTime_d", long(null))), time_t)
| extend EventEndTime = coalesce(unixtime_seconds_todatetime(column_ifexists("data_endTime_d", long(null))), time_t)
| extend SrcIpAddr=coalesce(column_ifexists("data_sourceAddress_s",''),data_identity_ipAddress_s)
, SrcPortNumber=column_ifexists("data_sourcePort_d", '')
, DstIpAddr=column_ifexists("data_destinationAddress_s",'')
, DstPortNumber=column_ifexists("data_destinationPort_d",'')
, DstBytes=column_ifexists("data_bytesOut_d",'')
, NetworkProtocol=column_ifexists("data_protocolName_s",'')
, data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s = column_ifexists("data_stateChange_current_Instance_displayName_s",'')
, data_stateChange_current_userName_s = column_ifexists("data_stateChange_current_userName_s",'')
, data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s = column_ifexists("data_request_headers_oci_original_url_s", '')
, data_action_s = column_ifexists("data_action_s",'')
| project-rename EventType=type_s
| project-rename EventMessage=data_message_s
| project-rename HttpUserAgentOriginal=data_identity_userAgent_s
| project-rename HttpStatusCode=data_response_status_s
| project-rename HttpRequestMethod=data_request_action_s
| union isfuzzy=true OCI_LogsV2_CL

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) solution provides the capability to ingest OCI Logs from OCI Stream into Microsoft Sentinel using the OCI Streaming REST API.

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This Solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

• Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Framework

Data Connectors: 1, Parsers: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 10, Hunting Queries: 10

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
